title: font i cam across come pop in for critique
content:
searching th internet came across this image what do poeple think like or dislike.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416070232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/text_5401.png)
author: 512pixel

comments.content: Interesting shapes. Illegible though. Not very useful in my opinion except to make interesting textures and patterns. Of course everything depends on what you're trying to communicate.
its by identikal go check them out and sure you would change your oppinion. the typeface are original and aimed at a particular market. So there is a typface for every1.

My opinion still hasn't changed - the font is still nearly illegible. It could prove useful by using the letter shapes to create texture and pattern in a design - but that means the font is acting less as a typeface and rather more as a design element. Again, everything (including usefulness) depends on what you're trying to communicate.
